title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite: Information Systems Laboratory Software Engineering: definitions, and basic concepts, waterfall model and its variants, software metrics, lines of code, function points, software science, and complexity measures, testing, validation and verification, software quality, defects, classification and analysis, software reliability models, configuration management, software estimation models, models of time and cost overruns.Booksâ¢Software Engineering: A Practitioner's Approach by Roger Pressman, 6th Edition, McGrawHill â¢Software Engineering by Ian Sommerville, Addison-Wesley â¢Fundamentals of Software Engineering by Rajiv Mall, PHI
